text:
[Verse 1]
Sunny days and endless nights
Chasing dreams in morning light
Golden rays and skies so blue
Living life with nothing to lose

[Verse 2]
Dancing in the summer rain
Washing away all the pain
Laughter fills the warm air
With you there
Without a care

[Chorus]
Sunshine dreams
Bright and true
Painting every shade of you
Heartbeats in time to the tune
Together we'll rise
Afternoon

[Verse 3]
Whispered secrets in the breeze
Flowing through the tall oak trees
Nature sings a song so sweet
Every moment feels complete

[Verse 4]
Stars will shine
Moon so high
Sparkling in the velvet sky
Hands held tight
The night is ours
Lost beneath the cosmic showers

[Chorus]
Sunshine dreams
Bright and true
Painting every shade of you
Heartbeats in time to the tune
Together we'll rise
Afternoon
title: Sunshine Dreams
